messages.title: Fair Taxes
messages.content: No one should have to pay any tax on their first £10,000 a year - according to Vince Cable and Nick Clegg. This would save the average taxpayer £700 per year.

messages.title: A fair chance for local businesses
messages.content: Local businesses are the heart of our communities and need more support from the Government. The Lib Dems would take action to protect our village shops, pubs and post offices.

messages.title: Fair Politics
messages.content: We need to end the old system in Westminster that has led to so much abuse by MPs. Lib Dems want a fairer voting system and the right to sack MPs who break the rules, to give real power back to voters.

messages.title: A fair start for our children
messages.content: The Lib Dems believe all children deserve a fair start in life. Our premium would pump £2 billion into our schools to cut class sizes and provide extra tuition to the children.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No tax on the first £10,000 of income, saving the average taxpayer £700 per year.
More support for local businesses to protect village shops, pubs, and post offices.
Reform the political system, introducing a fairer voting system and the right to sack misbehaving MPs.
Invest £2 billion in schools to reduce class sizes and provide extra tuition.

issues.education: Invest £2 billion in schools to reduce class sizes and provide extra tuition.
issues.governance: Reform the political system to allow for a fairer voting system and the power to sack MPs who break rules.

contactInformation.address: SE Cambs Lib Dems, FREEPOST, 16 Signet Court, Swann Road, Cambridge CB5 8LA

leaflet.additionalNotes: Help the Liberal Democrats win in SE Cambs
